result.execSummary:
The defendant Isaiah C Pozos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 5/01/2016 or penalty of 5 days Huber for non-payment.

Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.  Defendant must Petition the Court in writing upon successful completion of the sentence.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah C Pozos

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Isaiah C Pozos in court with attorney Clarice Rosa Perkins.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads guilty to count #2.  Court finds the defendant guilty of count #2.  Count #1 is dismissed and read in.  Restitution paid.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Perkins makes statements.  Defendant makes statements.  
The Court Orders the Following: Count #2. 
Restitution: Paid
FINE: $505.00
Total costs/fine/forfeiture:  to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 5/1/2016. Failure to pay;  the Court orders the defendant to serve 5 days in Huber 
Expunction is conditionally granted upon completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.  Defendant must Petition the Court in writing upon successful completion of the sentence.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 15, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Defendant Isaiah C Pozos in court with attorney Clarice Rosa Perkins.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no contact with co actors victim/witness/Waukesha County Health and Human Services building listed in the Criminal Complaint. Defendant may have incidential contact with co actors at school.

Defendant Isaiah C Pozos in court with attorney Clarice Rosa Perkins.  Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.
